name: enterprise-task-management-system
description: Enterprise-grade task management system with microfrontends and microservices

scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run start:dev --workspace=backend/auth-service" "npm run start:dev --workspace=backend/project-service" "npm run start:dev --workspace=backend/notification-service" "npm run start:dev --workspace=backend/migration-service"
scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=frontend/shell-app" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend/auth-mfe" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend/workspace-mfe" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend/analytics-mfe" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend/admin-mfe"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run prisma:generate && npm run build:all
scripts.prisma:generate:manual: cd backend/auth-service && npx prisma generate && cd ../project-service && npx prisma generate && cd ../..
